name: Pyke
title: the Bloodharbor Ripper
lore: A renowned harpooner from the slaughter docks of Bilgewater, Pyke should have met his death in the belly of a gigantic jaull-fish… and yet, he returned. Now, stalking the dank alleys and backways of his former hometown, he uses his new supernatural gifts to bring a swift and gruesome end to those who make their fortune by exploiting others—and a city that prides itself on hunting monsters now finds a monster hunting them.
blurb: A renowned harpooner from the slaughter docks of Bilgewater, Pyke should have met his death in the belly of a gigantic jaull-fish… and yet, he returned. Now, stalking the dank alleys and backways of his former hometown, he uses his new supernatural...
allytips: Pyke is very fragile so don't be afraid to temporarily run from a fight. You can regenerate a significant amount of health from Gift of the Drowned Ones when enemies can't see you.
Hitting an enemy with the Hold version of Bone Skewer will always pull them the same distance. Use it in melee range to throw targets behind you.
The Tap version of Bone Skewer is much faster and deals additional damage.
A lot of your agressive spells are also your escapes. Make sure you always have a plan to get out of the fight.
enemytips: Pyke regenerates a significant amount of damage he has taken from enemy champions, but only when you can't see him!
When Pyke is hidden nearby in his Ghostwater Dive, sharks will circle underneath your feet.
Try not to stand near low health allies. If Pyke executes them using Death From Below, you might be next on the list.

riot_spells.name: Bone Skewer
riot_spells.description: Pyke either stabs an enemy in front of him or pulls an enemy towards him.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Tap: Pyke stabs in a direction, damaging the nearest enemy (preferring champions).

Hold: Pyke throws his harpoon, pulling the first enemy struck towards him.

Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slows by {{ e9 }}% for {{ e8 }} second.

riot_spells.name: Ghostwater Dive
riot_spells.description: Pyke enters Camouflage and gains significant movement speed that decays over time.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Pyke gains Camouflage and {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f7 }}%) decaying movement speed for {{ e0 }} seconds.

Stealth - Camouflage: Pyke is hidden from view while enemy champions remain outside his detection radius. Attacking or casting spells ends Camouflage.

riot_spells.name: Phantom Undertow
riot_spells.description: Pyke dashes and leaves behind a phantom that will return to him, stunning enemy champions along its path.
riot_spells.tooltip: Pyke dashes, leaving a drowned phantom behind him. After a short delay the phantom returns to Pyke, striking enemy champions along its path, stunning them for {{ e2 }} <scaleLethality>(+{{ f10.01 }})</scaleLethality> seconds. Champions hit also take {{ e1 }} <scaleAD>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAD> physical damage.

riot_spells.name: Death From Below
riot_spells.description: Pyke blinks to and executes low health enemies, allowing him to cast this spell again and granting additional gold to an ally who assists.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Pyke strikes all enemy champions in an X, blinking to and executing targets below {{ rbasedamage }} (+{{ raddamage }}) (+{{ rlethalitydamage }}) health. Enemies not executed instead take physical damage equal to {{ reduceddamage*100 }}% of the threshold.

When an enemy champion dies in the X from any source, Pyke and an assisting ally both receive an additional Cut equal to full kill gold, and Pyke may re-cast Death From Below again within {{ rrecastduration }} seconds.

Total gold shared with allies: {{ f9 }}
Total gold kept for self: {{ f10 }}

riot_passive.name: Gift of the Drowned Ones
riot_passive.description: When Pyke is hidden from enemies, he regenerates damage that he has recently taken from champions. Pyke also cannot gain extra Maximum Health from any source, and instead gains Bonus AD.

wikia_champ.name: Pyke
wikia_champ.title: the Bloodharbor Ripper
wikia_champ.skill_r: Death from Below; Death from Below 2

i1.name: Gift of the Drowned Ones
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Pyke's''' maximum health cannot increase except through [[Growth#Increasing_Statistics|growth (per level)]], instead he gains{{ft|{{as|1 '''bonus''' attack damage}} {{as|per 14 '''bonus''' health}}|{{as|({{fd|7.143}}% '''bonus''' health)}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}}.
i1.description2: '''Pyke''' also stores {{pp|key=%|25 to 50}} of the damage he takes from enemy champions as ''Grey Health'' on his {{as|health bar}}, up to 80 {{as|(+ 800% '''bonus''' AD)}}, with an upper cap of {{as|60% of his '''maximum''' health}}.
i1.description3: When '''Pyke''' is unseen by enemies, he rapidly consumes his ''Grey Health'' to {{tip|heal}} for the same amount.
i1.notes:
* Game elements that increase health based on the champion's health (e.g {{ii|Cinderhulk}}, {{iis|Gargoyle Stoneplate}}, {{ri|Overgrowth}}) will increase the health before getting converted by ''Gift of the Drowned Ones'', thus granting increased {{as|bonus AD}}.
* {{ii|Spirit Visage}} and {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} take effect after ''Gift of the Drowned Ones's'' healing cap.
*'''Pyke's''' ''Grey Health'' does not have a time limit, and will stay on his {{as|health bar}} until '''Pyke''' leaves enemy vision or dies.
* Since '''Pyke's''' '''maximum''' health cannot be increased, ''Gift of the Drowned Ones'' reaches the upper cap of {{as|60% of '''maximum''' health}} at {{pp|(0.6*({{Data Pyke|pst2|hp_base}}+{{Data Pyke|pst2|hp_lvl}}*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1)))-80)/8|color=ad}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}.
* Amount of attack damage granted from list of items that grants health, converted with ''Gift of the Drowned Ones'':
{{stat table header|item}}{{Do for every item|item table row|p1n=2|p1v=pykehealth}}
{{stat table footer}}

q1.name: Bone Skewer
q1.description: {{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Pyke''' {{ct|windup|winds up|cast=interrupts|items=false|consume=Disabled, but can use trinkets}} for up to 3 seconds, increasing ''Bone Skewer's'' range by up to 700 units while being {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 20%.
q1.description2: {{sbc|Second Cast:}} '''Pyke''' {{tip|projectile|hurls}} his harpoon, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to the first enemy struck, {{tip|airborne|pulling}} them a fixed 550 units towards him and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 90% for 1 second.
q1.description3: Releasing the ability within {{fd|0.5}} seconds causes '''Pyke''' to instead thrust his harpoon, hitting the closest enemy unit, prioritizing enemy champions.
q1.description4: If '''Pyke''' is interrupted during the charge, or the charge completes without reactivation, ''Bone Skewer'' is cancelled and the ability is put on full cooldown but refunds {{sti|mana|{{as|half the mana cost}}}}.
q1.target_range: {{pp|type=channel time|7|400;400 to 1100|0;0.5 to 1|displayformula=400+(140 per 0.1 seconds, starting at 0.5 seconds). ''This is capped at 1 second.''}}
q1.notes:
* Since the pull is a fixed distance, '''Pyke''' will throw enemies behind him if he uses the ability at close range. 
* If '''Pyke''' casts the ability while it's on cooldown he will be unable to receive movement or attack commands for {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
* {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} and {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}} will only block the charged ability.

w1.name: Ghostwater Dive
w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pyke''' enters {{tip|camouflage}} and gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} that decays over 5 seconds. Enemies are notified if '''Pyke''' is within X-units of them.
w1.description2: Attacking or casting abilities immediately ends {{tip|camouflage}}.
w1.notes:
* When '''Pyke''' is hidden nearby in his ''Ghostwater Dive'', sharks will circle underneath nearby enemies' feet and a sound will be played, changing based on the amount of health they have left.
** Enemies will hear a disturbing deadly warning tone if their health bar is under the threshold of ''Death from Below''.

e1.name: Phantom Undertow
e1.description2: After 1 second, the phantom returns to '''Pyke''', {{tip|stun|stunning}} enemies it passes through for {{fd|1.25}} {{as|(+ {{fd|0.1}} per 10 Lethality)}} seconds. Enemy champions also take {{as|physical damage}}.

r1.name: Death from Below
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pyke''' marks the targeted area with an X which he strikes after a {{fd|0.75}} second delay, {{as|executing|true damage}} enemy {{tip|champions}} below {{pp|250;290;330;370;400;430;450;470;490;510;530;540;550|6 to 18}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|1.5}} per 1 Lethality)}} {{as|health}} while dealing 50% of the amount as {{as|physical damage}} to enemies not within the threshold for execution.
r1.description2: If ''Death from Below'' hits an enemy champion or one dies inside it, '''Pyke''' will {{tip|blink}} to the center of the X. For the latter case '''Pyke''' also gains the ability to recast within 20 seconds at no cost.
r1.description3: Each ''execution'' grants one {{ii|'Your Cut'}} to both '''Pyke''' and the last assisting ally, instead of its natural assist gold. In addition, each enemy champion killed inside the X by an ally grants '''Pyke''' two stacks of {{ii|'Your Cut'}}.
r1.notes:
* {{ii|'Your Cut'}} is an item that can be consumed to gain gold. If the ally's inventory is full, it's auto-consumed.
** When {{ii|'Your Cut'}} is consumed, it quickly grants {{g|100}} stacks until reaching the full gold value.
* Only the target's current health will count as '''Pyke's''' damage in post-game statistics and {{sti|spell vamp}} healing if executed.
** If the target's current health is less than 50% of the {{tt|post-mitigation|after damage modifiers}} non-executing damage, '''Pyke''' will heal less from spell vamp.
